cocktails.name: Mojito recipe
cocktails.recipe: Mix this classic cocktail for a party using fresh mint, white rum, sugar, zesty lime and cooling soda water. Play with the quantities to suit your taste.

cocktails.name: Espresso martini
cocktails.recipe: Learn how to make this classic coffee cocktail. Our easy recipe uses freshly brewed espresso, a dash of coffee liqueur and a simple sugar syrup.

cocktails.name: Aperol spritz
cocktails.recipe: Get a taste of summer with our take on this classic Italian cocktail of Aperol, prosecco and soda. Try our proportions or adjust the ratio to taste

cocktails.name: Rhubarb fizz
cocktails.recipe: Use bright-pink stemmed rhubarb to achieve the gorgeous blush colour in this rhubarb fizz cocktail, made with a blend of sparkling wine and gin

cocktails.name: Blood beetroot
cocktails.recipe: This blood-red lemonade and Prosecco combo is sure to be your new favourite spooky tipple
